website_summaries.verdict: If your budget is your top concern, this under-cabinet range hood does a reasonable job tackling cooking fumes and saving you money.
pros: Basic yet functional, as it is easy to install, use, and maintain
Has a filter that isn't difficult to clean
Offers a simple design at an affordable price
cons: Underpowered compared to others on our list
Finish may fade over time with normal use and cleaning

website_summaries.verdict: An effective and durable range hood that works great for vertical discharge installations.
pros: Features a fan designed for years of trouble-free service
Boasts a protective lamp lens that distributes light evenly over the cooktop
User-friendly control switches make it simple to adjust the fan speed and activate the light
cons: Color may fade after extended cleaning
Weak airflow in comparison to similar options

customer_reviews.title: looks good and works very well and the install is lift ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit isn't top of the line but can't go wrong. Fewer parts to go to break down. Shape is the key. The corners don't stick out to poke you when you come around the corner. It is basic, looks good and works very well and the install is lift and push. Nice job. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon J Hague

customer_reviews.title: A bargain... and a great design.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that the quality was not going to be very good as the cost was very (very) reasonable, but as it turned out- it works absolutely perfectly, and looks really nice in stainless steel. You can put an energy-efficient bulb in it, and it gives off a tremendous amount of light, much better than the funky greasy nasty old range hood that I was using previously. This has proven to be the best value of any kitchen item I have, and I appreciate using this on a daily basis... each and every day. I highly recommend this item. The seller was quick to ship. AAA+ thank you...!
customer_reviews.author: Musicman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and just as described
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and just as described! My only complaint is that the listing does not tell you that you'll need the BP87 damper in most cases. It's only about $8 on Amazon and $10 in retail stores, but the installation of this was delayed because I had to go get the extra part.
customer_reviews.author: guerilla_radi0

customer_reviews.title: Underbelly of unit completely visible from any angle.
customer_reviews.text: The product description says to install "at least" 18 inches above range top. When installed, mine was 30 inches. the complete underbelly (filter, light, etc) is visible from any angle. Not sure what the purpose of the "slanted" filter is. The 30 year old hood that this replaced was also very inexpensive, but the filter lay flat and nothing was visible unless you looked up under the hood. It was exactly the same size as this Broan. I realize this is the "economy" model, but it looks very tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Steelheart

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetically good; functionally just OK
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it looked very similar to the old Kenmore one it was replacing, and I hoped it would be a simple swap . . . close, but not quite. One REAL problem, though, is that the tapered end of the vent shaft was not tapered nearly enough and, after many attempts and vituperative epithets, proved impossible to fit into the vent. I finally just caved and used some pliers to crimp the perimeter of the shaft to decrease its diameter to get it started and then used a rubber mallet to force it the rest of the way into the vent. The fan doesn't seem to pull much air, even on high. Cosmetically, it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: badley

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy and the price is attractive
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy and the price is attractive. But this thing is cheap. I mean, the grease trap filter is a joke, and the light switch is already janky. It might be ok for a rental or house you wanna flip but for a home you live and cook in, I'd step it up a few notches instead of buying this. I regret not looking for something higher quality, with a real grease trap.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Burchfield

customer_reviews.title: Make sure if the range hood you are looking for needs to have a duct on top before you buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping, I ordered on Saturday afternoon, and received it the next Monday @3:00pm 😄, packaged was intact, so no damage at all. I just installed it, and look really nice! The Previous hood range I had was exactly the same model, but in white color, and that one had a kind of vent on top of the duct, that doesn’t come with the one I just bought (that is why I gave it only five stars) so I just took it off from the old one to reuse it with the new one and works perfect! 😊 Also, is not noisy as some other range hoods. Will buy it again for sure 😉
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Be aware, the hood has no cover underneath; fan is VERY noisy and so 80's technology
customer_reviews.text: the picture is misleading. when you look under the hood, no pun intended, there is no cover/filter/etc. just a flimsy small filter covering the noisy fan. We all know after couple of cooking sessions, the grease will settle right up the hood and no way of cleaning it. Was wondering why there is no picture of inside of the noisy hood, now I know why, because no one would pay for this piece of truly trash, had one seen a picture of it.
customer_reviews.author: patrick soltani

customer_reviews.title: Affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Had to do a lot of work to get this to line up to the existing duct work because it is about a 1/2" wider on the back then the one that was previously installed. Not to mention that the instructions that came with it could of been simplified.
customer_reviews.author: torlaura

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I’m ashamed to say I desperately needed this range for years because mine stopped working and it was really greasy and old but turns out it was the wiring that stopped working in the wall. When you get one of these you need a damper and possibly a reducer to connect to your venting. I wasn’t too hard to install but you need 2 people. I’m so glad Amazon had this one for $30+ because I was trying to save some money and repair things around the house. I had to order a cord after trying to install my range and that worked out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: True

customer_reviews.title: which is good if you are replacing an old on with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Standard, no frills vent hood. It has the same dimensions as the company has used for 30-40 years now, which is good if you are replacing an old on with a new one. Note that there is no electrical cord. If you are using this to replace an old one, you have to move the cord from your old unit to the new one or hard wire depending on your setup. Also, vent flaps are not included. You will need to buy separately. I did not think the fan was especially loud as some reviewers have said. This is the low cost option after all.
customer_reviews.author: JWB

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Make sure to order the correct fan if your fan is ventilated with a duct. Mine vents in the back wall. I ordered a top vented the first time and had to return it. This model has a few different options. ** The power box hookup is on the right side. My house wire was on the left and my electrician got creative. Honestly, I think all range hood fans run on the somewhat noisy side. But it does the job and looks nice. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: Backwards controls.
customer_reviews.text: Basic minimalist range hood in stainless steel. Stainless skin is very lightweight and flimsy. The switch controls for the fan and light were backwards so I reversed them which makes the fan HI/LOW label backwards. Low is on the left side, High is on the right side now. At least I can operate it without having to read the label. I had to remove the light switch and turn it over to make it work the right way. The switches used on this model are very available from many suppliers so if they ever go bad it should be easy to find replacements. The aluminum mesh filter may be harder to find, It measures 8-3/4 x 10-1/2", about 1/8" thick.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, I'd order it again
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, no issues with it. Only thing was it was a little thinner than the previous range that was there, so there's a slight gap under the bridge cabinet due to the wiring there, so if you're doing a replacement, just make sure you get your measurements right, but that's not the fault of the product. Other than that, it works great so far, and I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alfie RB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a 41 year old unit with a broken fan. Relatively easy to install, looks great, fan is quieter than the one it replaced. Very satisfied with the product. One minor issue was the Br87 damper recommended. It didn't fit with the 7 inch exhaust pipe and the unit, though it should have, so we left it off. The original unit didn't have a damper and it was fine for 41 years. The damper is a non returnable item on Amazon so be sure you'll use it before you decide to buy it. Customer service was extremely helpful and credited my account anyway. I'm very grateful.
customer_reviews.author: DalGal

customer_reviews.title: range hood
customer_reviews.text: definitely cheaper than homedepot. something like this cost 2x at my local homedepot. Pro: gets the job done. con: you get what you pay for. only has one light bulb. screw holes were at inconvenient locations. no side screws, had to drill them in. I'd buy again if needed
customer_reviews.author: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

customer_reviews.title: just fine
customer_reviews.text: We were not looking for anything fancy. Just wanted to replace the old one. Wanted a blower and a light. All went together easily and works excellent. The price was right, the color and condition right, and it works just the way i need a simple little range hood to work. No complaints at all but have only had a month; however, i anticipate no problems.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Looks good,  easy to install,
customer_reviews.text: I got this hood since in my summer kitchen there was no vent and every time we used it, made the entire place smell like food. I decided to install the hood with the vent towards outside and while making the hole was not easy the rest of the installation was. It looks nice and clean and works as in the description. We use it sometimes so I did not need anything very expensive so I am glad this was available.
customer_reviews.author: AngelM

customer_reviews.title: Affordable range hood; works fine and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: In my case, the range hood was easy to install with the existing duct work. The hood works fine and looks good! It definitely was affordable! I must say that I had received the 'same' range hood a couple weeks ago. That hood sustained damage to a back corner during transit. I was able to fix it so that it was not noticeable. However, when that hood was installed, a slighter dent at the front became noticeable. Amazon was able to exchange that hood for the current one ... no problem, quick turn-around. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous813

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is just what I wanted it is a simple Range hood but wow the Price. It is classic, easy to clean exterior and works great! I have had this for months and I have NO COMPLAINTS
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just received this last Friday & my son installed it yesterday. Looks great & works great! Very good quality...definitely recommend it. It was cheaper thru Amazon than at Lowe's & faster delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Robin S.

customer_reviews.title: If the mfg has a touch up paint to send that would be great. The hood was as expected in terms of ...
customer_reviews.text: The range hood arrived fast. There was a small paint chip on the top right hand side of the hood. If the mfg has a touch up paint to send that would be great. The hood was as expected in terms of replacing my old one which was of the similar model only older.
customer_reviews.author: M.Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Clean, simple, quiet!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this in boyfriend's rental house, it's very quiet on low, and very tolerable on high. He said the install was relatively easy, once he found the right adjustable ductwork to get this one's centered cowling to line up (old fan was original with the manufactured home and was slightly off-center). Nice clean, simple design - the black just fades into the background. Going to purchase one for my home to replace the 37-year old noisy fan hood with peeling paint.
customer_reviews.author: Carol RN

customer_reviews.title: they both work great. the price was great too
customer_reviews.text: For years I. Complained that there was npt enough lite over my stove .finally my husband put a fan with light.they both work great.the price was great too.
customer_reviews.author: James Gildersleeve

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: Good range hood. Fans are super strong but can be a little noisy because of this. Stainless steel is easier to clean but can still accumulate grease if not cleaned every so often preferably at least once a month. Built in light illumates everything well.
customer_reviews.author: Heraldo

customer_reviews.title: Great range hood for the price
customer_reviews.text: We took out the over the over microwave and were looking for something more streamlined and less bulky. This was easy to install and took almost no time. I did have my wife help me hold it up as I screwed it in to the cabinets. I works great.
customer_reviews.author: baseballer34

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen basic that looks sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our modern kitchen. However, it didn't come with a damper and I didn't know to order one. So, a last-minute run by my contractor was required. The orange hardware store didn't carry the 7-inch damper, but the blue one did. It was only $10. So all in all, our new hood was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Red

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with everything needed to install was a pain to install and it is very load
customer_reviews.author: Joe parsons

customer_reviews.title: Working well with flimsy buttons
customer_reviews.text: After some interesting HVAC duct work I finally was able to install this in our old house. It seems to be working great, but the buttons are a bit flimsy. Hopefully it will last as long as the old Broan that was here for over 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: wings

customer_reviews.title: powerful and quiet
customer_reviews.text: On low the fan is very quiet, yet still moves enough air to pass the papertowel test. On high the fan clears our entire kitchen quickly. Amazing quality for the price. The light fixture is positioned perfectly. A small LED bulb and we've got plenty of light to cook with. We're very happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic vented Hood
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, quiet, does what its intended to do. I bought this to replace another Broan hood which was about 60 years old.
customer_reviews.author: James Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Looks and runs great
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome with appliances. Only complaint is it get a little hot with the light turned on. Going to try switching to led light and see if it takes care of the product. Does work good though
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 28 Year Old Stove Hood
customer_reviews.text: Used as an original replacement, matched size perfectly, switches color change was fine, as well as, the updated changes for alternate installations while keeping the upper circular exhaust. Very easy sprucing up in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! Great discount price for the couple of very small dings on the side from amazon warehouse. Sucks steam and cooking smells right out.
customer_reviews.author: Krystie

customer_reviews.title: miss my old one
customer_reviews.text: My son and husband had to remodel it to fit in the old space where a Broan product had been. The fan is beyond LOUD.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: We needed a stainless steel vent to match our appliances and this worked great. Good price, sturdy, and looks nice. It fit the space perfectly. My only complaint would be when installing we had trouble with a screw needing to go behind the back of the light switch and we were not able to remove it. Once up we have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I hope it will work longer than the previous one. It looks very good with white cabinets. Actually I don't know if it is easy to clean, I expect that being black it will not show stains as much as the white one did.
customer_reviews.author: Practical G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to install. We read comments about thr fan being too loud. It is a bit loud, but it's not screaming and we only have it on for a short time so it is no biggie for us. We are really happy with this oven hood.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This was such a good buy!! The only thing I will say is that double check your venting system. I didn’t research that before hand and my husband had to do a little more work.
customer_reviews.author: beth22

customer_reviews.title: Very good hood
customer_reviews.text: Great hood fan works well. The fan is loud on both speeds the high speed it’s really loud. But the style is clean and in solid stainless steel it’s really nice. Very good for the price hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: JustJoeyW

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: this replaced an old hood so the wiring and the opening lined up with the existing venting and wiring. one person can install with a little inovative thinking to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: dakota

customer_reviews.title: Noise
customer_reviews.text: Makes too much noise after few weeks not worth it
customer_reviews.author: rubab rahman

customer_reviews.title: ok for price
customer_reviews.text: unit is not square and whoever is doing their bending needs a look see at their qa as it doesnt sit flush against rear wall. does the trick though. get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Not 5/8 hole it is 7in not what picture says
customer_reviews.text: The hole one the top is 7in the picture says 5/8 I had to return twice and ordering from different people.. It’s nice if you need the 7in hole to install it ..
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our old range hood/ microwave with this new range hood. I love it. It’s simple, but it works so well. 2 fan settings and 2 light settings. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: strychnine

customer_reviews.title: Great value, very nice hood.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality; fairly quiet compared to my previous hoods; easy to install. Have had it for a month now with no problems. It’s solid, reliable and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Moves the air!
customer_reviews.text: we bought this to capture heat from above our coal stove and push it to unused vents when it gets super cold. The fan is powerful and does exactly what we bought it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yup.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find this at Home Depot or Lowes in the size and color I needed. Amazon to the rescue, as usual. Fit perfectly to replace a really funky old one. Easy to install. I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Levitate Audio

customer_reviews.title: nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: great product but I was unable to install, my overhead vents directly out the back not out the top and there is no panel to give you a chose, it is only out the top. The box ripped in transit so to date I have been unable to use. I do anticipate I will be able to use a hax saw and cut a hole in the back to vent. then the top vent will be directly to the flat bottom of the cabinet and this should not be a problem. I feel I should have read the description better.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Simple, basic range-hood - Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: Basic under-cabinet range hood, really useful to install and place above a stove to catch all the fumes or vapors from cooking foods. Best of all is the price as you can toss and get a brand new one if you don't want to clean it after a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive range hood
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what stretch means for the stars? Nice inexpensive hood, works well and looks good. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lbcoyote

customer_reviews.title: Vents to the outside only! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! My kitchen fan vents to the outside and it's been difficult to find a replacement that vented ONLY to the outside and not have the vents too. This vent fit perfectly and looks great without those annoying and hard to clean vents. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: AZ Lady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kitchen good/fan.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kitchen good/fan. Works great, looks great, and great price, fast delivery. Exhaust to outside via duct.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. I guess you get what you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe

customer_reviews.title: ... from the 1960's and I couldn't have made a better choice. For the reviewers who say the front ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hood to replace a hood from the 1960's and I couldn't have made a better choice. For the reviewers who say the front is left uncovered, if you look inside of the fan, there is a cover taped up there that snaps on to the front to block the smoke. It fit perfect and it was so easy to install that I didn't even have to ask for my husbands help!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight stove hood.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new stove hood and this did the job. Light weight, easy to install, and the fan & light came on just fine. When I say easy to install, I mean attach the new hood. The wiring connections were more difficult. For the price, a good choice ( better price than my local hardware stores). Do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MacBob

customer_reviews.title: Good value easy install but very loud.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking easy install even though there is a hole on top right I had to drill 1/2 an inch hole on top front left to re-route my electric cable. Be aware this unit is very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Acemicros

customer_reviews.title: Round only
customer_reviews.text: It would have been perfect except it is for a round top vent and I needed back rectangular. I thought the description said that it was adjustable, but it was not. So I had to return and order the correct one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a rent house after spending hours trying to clean the the existing one. It looks great. It's very well made and sturdy. I plan to replace all the vent hoods in my rental with these.
customer_reviews.author: A. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Easy installation Black wires with black White with white Green to ground
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is used
customer_reviews.text: The hood is fine but don't buy the used one like I did. It is missing the filter so after I had to buy one the cost is about the same as a new one. There were several places where the paint was chipped but the unit was clean and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond F. Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Stylish range hood
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very stylish. The light is bright, use it during cooking. Fan works great. Not a bulky range hood. Upgraded my old kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet efficiency
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very quiet. I love the ease of installation. Took about 1/2 hour. Cleans up easily
customer_reviews.author: JForeman

customer_reviews.title: Don't skimp for this unless youre a handyman. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't skimp for this unless youre a handyman. It takes extra wires & stuff to work. I had to call a friend / electrician to mount it and make it work. Cheap.
customer_reviews.author: K. king

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the old Broan that we had for several years. The fan simply gave out on the ball-bearing. This one has a fan setting of high or low while the old one had a knob for gradual control. Prefer this as you don't have to be so choosy.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D.

customer_reviews.title: Timely delivery
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for delivering the range hood on time. I have needed one for a while. Even though it did have ding on the hood it work wonderfully. I am sure it will last for a very long time just like the one I had before. That is why I keep buying Broan-Nu-Tone range hoods.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Nice produce, but had to return-has a round vent-I ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice produce, but had to return-has a round vent-I needed rectangle-I could not find this info before ordering-so, I made a bad choice, but the product is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: No more food fumes
customer_reviews.text: Great priced Hood. The exhaust works amazing in pulling out the cooking fumes, no more food fumes sneak into the interior of the home. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marabe

customer_reviews.title: pretty cheap,
customer_reviews.text: Just know you getting a low level product. I also found out that the hole is in a different location then my old one. ( closer toward the front. "measure 1st" It is not to loud.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Maile

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect. The only challenge was getting 7” duct work ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hood range to replace a old one that was badly modified. I have no complaints on it. Works perfect. The only challenge was getting 7” duct work for it. They make 6” and 8” duct work readily available but 7” is a challenge. And to correctly install it you need 7”. Which includes the end cover. Would recommend this hood range.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Basic, but still very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, straight forward install. Looks nice and works as expected! If you’re looking for a high quality, chef inspired hood vent, this isn’t it. But, it gets the job done and looks nice while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great price great item
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove! Great price, reasonable item that does the job without all the un needed gadgets...no it doesn't get 57 cable channels or talk to my phone but it does vent the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It was fine. A little noisy. But for the money I paid it was expected. Good quality. Not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie M.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat flimsy build (watch tightening the screws as the welds are frail and the metal not all that strong) but looks good and works better than the GE range hood it replaced. The fan is very noisy but it really moves some air! Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Switching to this one makes our kitchen look very nice and clean
customer_reviews.text: Just Installed this Under Cabinet Range to replace our existing one that is outdated from the 70s. Switching to this one makes our kitchen look very nice and clean. It was easy to install and has 2 fan speeds. The low is very quiet, however the high is a little loud, but not that big of a deal. For the price, it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great price compared to the big box stores same quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price ! It is reasonably quiet and sucks well. You have to appreciate that! The fit and finish seem fine and very easy to install. It would be nice if it had two light sockets but otherwise I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Erik W.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific fit, looks fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Bolted right in, like it was made for it! This replaced our old stove hood that had been discontinued. Our old one was pained white and the paint had peeled in places long ago, making it impossible to clean. I'm so glad it was no longer available which prompted getting this beauty! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: H. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I wasn't expecting much. I was pleasantly surprised to get a very nice looking, very good working range hood. The light is sufficient, and the low and high speeds are both quieter than the range hood this replaced. It's easy to put up, I bought a damper (this one didn't come with it) it fits perfectly and dresses up my kitchen. It matches my stainless steel appliances well.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskawoman

customer_reviews.title: matches my new stainless steel appliances
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to replace a vent hood that wasn't too expensive. This is a vented hood that fit perfectly and matched the new appliances...good price. It's a little noisy, but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Delivered DENTED
customer_reviews.text: Box had a dent in it when delivered, I opened and quickly examined. everything look fine. so today I installed the new one. The last thing I did was remove the blue protection tape. DENT Underneath ! Very disappointed after all the effort of having installed a dented product
customer_reviews.author: kevin courage

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This vent hood was super easy to install and looks great. If I needed another I would certainly buy again. It came shipped very nicely and had no scratches or dings in it.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaLexi79

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Took some work to install since the exhaust flange was quite a bit larger than my old one, but worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hardie

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was obvious that there was no bottom to ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was obvious that there was no bottom to the vent! It's OK for the price, but I would've opted for something that looked more complete for some more money than an OK priced item with no bottom. It's not what we were looking for-- what a deceptive picture!
customer_reviews.author: Got your fanta?

customer_reviews.title: Glad Amazon had it
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect Looks wonderful in my mothers kitchen she loves it. Excellent product Very well made. I will order from this company again. When I remodel my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: MKW

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described in add. Arrived quickly and in perfect condition. Pairs well with my black stainless steel stove and fridge at a fraction of the cost of a black SS hood.
customer_reviews.author: LNM

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Pretty simple to install. Glad I brought this on Amazon instead of at a home improvement store!
customer_reviews.author: honestopinion

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and does everything it needs to for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: teamruybal

customer_reviews.title: Brian under cabinet range hood
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace white hood exactly like this one to make it easy to install. Still don’t like the buttons on the top of the hood as they are hard to reach, would prefer buttons at lower front.
customer_reviews.author: luvmyboat

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older unit. This is a good product. It is a little noisy on highest speed
customer_reviews.author: jerry l hardy jr

customer_reviews.title: I would have loved it for real if I did not order this ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved it for real if I did not order this one with a vent hole. I was able to return it and get the exact replica minus the vent hole. It looks great with dark cabinets and stainless steel appliances, it blends in which is what I wanted. Easy to clean and does its job.
customer_reviews.author: IsThatSo

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Good quality! Fair price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful range hood at a fair price! It was easy to install and it works well! It is also easy to clean. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fine product.
customer_reviews.text: Fine product... It works just as it should and looks great. I, however ordered the wrong range hood. I managed to make it fit as it was designed, but I should have ordered the ventless hood that has the horizontal vent openings for the fan on the front of the unit. Nevertheless, both units look very similar and are a very practical choice, as they fulfill the need for which the are intended and they do so at a very reasonable and economical price. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Our old exhaust fan stopped working so we tried to find a replacement locally. No luck. Went to amazon on line, found Broan, checked measurements, ordered. Best price ever, fast shipping..perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: NW Iowa

customer_reviews.title: EXcellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when ordering. The price ($75.00) was so very reasonable and I was concerned it wouldn't match the stainless finish on my Frigidaire Gallery range and fridge. Results: perfect match, great quality, not too loud at all. This totally beats paying $270.00 for the hood that Frigidaire makes for their Gallery appliance collection!!
customer_reviews.author: HuckleBerryHound

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful range
customer_reviews.text: This hood range is wonderful. We had an old white hood fan before and everything in our kitchen is black with stainless steel, and this range really looks ties the appliances together. The fan isn't really loud even on high speeds. Was super easy to install. Perfect addition to our kitchen and for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: the item was discounted because it was damaged. i got it for less than half the new price. i am unable to find anything about it that doesn't seem brand new.
customer_reviews.author: conbrio

customer_reviews.title: works real good and easy install but be careful
customer_reviews.text: works real good and easy install but be careful...make sure you know what kind of venting you have. I had none so this unit is self contained. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: JKWALTON

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy to install, but my husband handled it well. It is rather noisy, but it looks great & does it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Finally got the right one - I ordered the wrong ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the right one - I ordered the wrong one first time round - dah - this one fit exactly the same as the old - working great
customer_reviews.author: Louis souther

customer_reviews.title: Good fan for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great fan replacement for 30 year old Broan. Still works but instead of painting deceided on new one.
customer_reviews.author: James Donald Yarborough Jr

product_meta.title: Broan-NuTone 423001 Exhaust Fan for Under Cabinet Convertible Range Hood Insert with Light, 6.0 Sones, 190 CFM, White
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Size:6.0 Sones, 190 CFM| Style:1.0| Pattern Name:Range HoodUpgrade your kitchen with the Broan Range Hood Insert and Light! This versatile insert is the perfect solution to your ventilation needs serving as both an exhaust fan and overhead light for your stove. The HVI- 2100 Certified almond unit is designed to fit neatly underneath your cabinets and installs as 7" round ducting with a 190 CFM and 6.0 Sones performance. It features a fan designed for years of trouble free service, an easy to clean grease filter, protective lamp lens, and control switches for fan speed and light activation. The protective lamp lens distributes light evenly over the cooktop and accepts up to 75W bulb (not included). It features a dishwasher-safe aluminum grease filter for easy cleaning. Install the insert at least 18" above cook top. The sides are mitered and the bottom edge hemmed, with no sharp edges for safety and good looks. For your convenience, this range hood can work in an ADA-compliant application and includes a 1 year limited warranty. Enhance your home today with the Broan Range Hood Insert and Light!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The 42000 series offers an effective and durable under-the-cabinet hood solution for vertical discharge installations. The range hood is designed for 7-Inch round vertical duct attachment. The hood comes in a variety of appliance matching colors and widths, and features a fan designed for years of trouble free service, an easy to clean grease filter, an easy to clean grease filter, a protective lamp lens that distributes light evenly over the cook-top and control switches for fan speed and light activation. Includes built-in 7-Inch duct adapter. Installs as 7-Inch round ducted only. 190 CFM, 6.0 Sone (vertical discharge) performance. HVI 2100 Certified. Dishwasher-safe aluminum grease filter. Accepts up to 75-Watt light (bulb not included). Built-in 7-Inch adapter. BP87 dampers sold separately. This range hood can work in an ADA-compliant application. The total load on the control must not exceed 20 AMPS, at 120 VAC
feature_bullets: HIGH-QUALITY RANGE HOOD INSERT: Hood insert improves ventilation and lighting over your stove at 190 CFM and 6.0 Sones with a 7" round vertical duct for your convenience
EFFECTIVE INCANDESCENT LIGHTING: A protective lamp lens distributes light evenly over the cook-top and accepts up to 75W bulb (bulb not included)
EASY CARE: One-piece, dishwasher safe aluminum mesh filter means you can maintain optimum grease capture and keep the kitchen fresh
VERSATILE: Separate rocker switches control the light and the 2-speed fan for easy use. No Ductless Recirculation Capable. No Ductless Filter Or Kit Included. Vent Type- Ducted Only
IDEAL SIZE: Range hood insert measures 30" and should be installed at least 18" above cook top
Accepts up to 75-Watt light (bulb not included)
